mapper.select: SELECT ce.exam_seq,ce.exam_name FROM csat_exam ce LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT csat_seq,exam_seq,COUNT(*) AS average FROM csat_exam_avg GROUP BY exam_seq) cea ON ( ce.csat_seq = cea.csat_seq AND ce.exam_seq = cea.exam_seq ) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT csat_seq,exam_seq,COUNT(*) AS subject FROM csat_exam_subject GROUP BY exam_seq) cest ON ( ce.csat_seq = cest.csat_seq AND ce.exam_seq = cest.exam_seq ) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT csat_seq,exam_seq,COUNT(*) AS section FROM csat_exam_section GROUP BY exam_seq) ces ON ( ce.csat_seq = ces.csat_seq AND ce.exam_seq = ces.exam_seq ) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT csat_seq,exam_seq,COUNT(*) AS ratingcut FROM csat_exam_rating_cut GROUP BY exam_seq) cerc ON ( ce.csat_seq = cerc.csat_seq AND ce.exam_seq = cerc.exam_seq ) WHERE ce.csat_seq = #{csatSequence} AND !( IFNULL(cea.average, 0) = 0 AND IFNULL(cest.subject, 0) = 0 AND IFNULL(ces.section, 0) = 0 AND IFNULL(cerc.ratingcut, 0) = 0 ) ORDER BY ce.exam_seq desc

SELECT cerc.csat_seq,cerc.exam_seq,cerc.rating_code,ces.subject_name, cerc.raw_score, cerc.standard_score FROM csat_exam_rating_cut cerc LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM csat_exam_subject WHERE csat_seq = #{csatSequence} AND exam_seq = #{examSequence}) ces ON ( cerc.csat_seq = ces.csat_seq AND cerc.exam_seq = ces.exam_seq AND cerc.section_seq = ces.section_seq AND cerc.subject_seq = ces.subject_seq ) WHERE cerc.csat_seq = #{csatSequence} AND cerc.exam_seq = #{examSequence} AND cerc.rating_code <= #{upperRatingCode} AND cerc.rating_code >= #{lowerRatingCode} ORDER BY cerc.section_seq,cerc.subject_seq,cerc.rating_code

SELECT ce.exam_seq,ce.exam_name FROM csat_exam ce LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT csat_seq,exam_seq,COUNT(*) AS average FROM csat_exam_avg GROUP BY exam_seq) cea ON ( ce.csat_seq = cea.csat_seq AND ce.exam_seq = cea.exam_seq ) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT csat_seq,exam_seq,COUNT(*) AS subject FROM csat_exam_subject GROUP BY exam_seq) cest ON ( ce.csat_seq = cest.csat_seq AND ce.exam_seq = cest.exam_seq ) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT csat_seq,exam_seq,COUNT(*) AS section FROM csat_exam_section GROUP BY exam_seq) ces ON ( ce.csat_seq = ces.csat_seq AND ce.exam_seq = ces.exam_seq ) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT csat_seq,exam_seq,COUNT(*) AS ratingcut FROM csat_exam_rating_cut GROUP BY exam_seq) cerc ON ( ce.csat_seq = cerc.csat_seq AND ce.exam_seq = cerc.exam_seq ) WHERE ce.csat_seq = #{csatSequence} AND ( IFNULL(cea.average, 0) = 0 AND IFNULL(cest.subject, 0) = 0 AND IFNULL(ces.section, 0) = 0 AND IFNULL(cerc.ratingcut, 0) = 0 )
